results.title: Effect of Simvastatin-Ezetimibe Compared With Simvastatin Monotherapy After Acute Coronary Syndrome Among Patients 75 Years or Older: A Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial.
results.text_hl: The rate of adverse events did not increase with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ vs @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-placebo among younger or older @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Bach RG, Cannon CP, Giugliano RP, White JA, Lokhnygina Y, Bohula EA, Califf RM, Braunwald E, Blazing MA. Effect of Simvastatin-Ezetimibe Compared With Simvastatin Monotherapy After Acute Coronary Syndrome Among Patients 75 Years or Older: A Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial. JAMA Cardiol. 2019 Sep 1;4(9):846-854. PMID: 31314050

results.title: Clinical implications of electrocardiographic left ventricular strain and hypertrophy in asymptomatic patients with aortic stenosis: the Simvastatin and Ezetimibe in Aortic Stenosis study.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: Data were obtained in asymptomatic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ randomized to @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@ combination versus placebo in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@Simvastatin and Ezetimibe@@@ in @DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@Aortic Stenosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@SEAS@@@) study.

citations.NLM: Greve AM, Boman K, Gohlke-Baerwolf C, Kesäniemi YA, Nienaber C, Ray S, Egstrup K, Rossebø AB, Devereux RB, Køber L, Willenheimer R, Wachtell K. Clinical implications of electrocardiographic left ventricular strain and hypertrophy in asymptomatic patients with aortic stenosis: the Simvastatin and Ezetimibe in Aortic Stenosis study.
